titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Calvin Ford
CWG13702

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
NO. 22.The State of Kentucky
The United States,
To Calvin Ford Dr

1862.
August 22 To Hawling 4 horse team 2 days at $3.00 $6.00
" " do 2 horse team & hand 4 days -- 2.50 10.00
16.00
(hawling Military stores & subsistance) at Eminence Camp

Approved By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
approved Richard T. Jacob Col. 9th Ky Co
I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated: and that they were a necessary for the Public Service.

Chas A. Clarke Lt & R. Q. M
9th Ky Cav
Received at Frankfort on, the 18" of Dec, 18623, of S. G. Suddarth Q. M. Genl Quartermaster U.S. Army State of Ky^, the sum of sixteen Dollars and -- cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.No. 62 Abstract B U Qr. 1862.
Calvin Ford
Dollars 16 -- /100
Paid Decr 18 18623
Transportation
J232
